root.name: Sega Superstars Tennis
root.description: OverviewSega Superstars Tennis is a tennis game made by Sega. As part of the Sega Superstars franchise, this is a game where you get to play as many different Sega characters in a game of tennis. You're able to play as Sonic, NiGHTS, Amigo, Tails, Dr. Eggman, Jet, Ulala, AiAi, and many more. You're able to play as singles or doubles in tennis, play in tournaments, play against people online, and even play some minigames in Planet Superstars.Playable CharactersSonic the Hedgehog (Sonic the Hedgehog)Miles "Tails" Prower (Sonic the Hedgehog)Shadow the Hedgehog (Sonic the Hedgehog)Amy Rose (Sonic the Hedgehog)Dr. Eggman (Sonic the Hedgehog)Alex Kidd (Alex Kidd)Gilius Thunderhead (Golden Axe)Beat (Jet Set Radio)Gum (Jet Set Radio)Ulala (Space Channel 5)Pudding (Space Channel 5)Amigo (Samba De Amigo)NIGHTS (Nights)Reala (Nights)Aiai (Super Monkey Ball)Meemee (Super Monkey Ball)
